title: Mechanism of two styryl BODIPYs as fluorescent probes and protective agents in lipid bilayers against aqueous ClO−
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28957-28964
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03433C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lu Yang, Yanglin Jiang, Ailin Sun, Mingqing Chen, Qiwei Li, Peng Wang, Jianping Zhang
Two styryl BODIPY derivatives, BOH and BOE, with different hydrophilic properties, were investigated for their reaction mechanisms in lipid bilayers against aqueous ClO−, by both experimental and theoretical methods.
